geoip.name: postalCode
geoip.description: local postal code, e.g. zip code in the US

geoip.name: subdivision
geoip.description: full name of subdivision, e.g. state in the US

geoip.name: region
geoip.description: iso_code name of region, e.g. state two-letter code in the US

geoip.name: cc_by_ip
geoip.description: Two-letter country code corresponding to the modal IP address

geoip.name: un_major_region
geoip.description: UN defined sub-continent major geographic regions corresponding to modal IP address

geoip.name: un_economic_group
geoip.description: UN defined major geographical economic groups (developing and developed nations) corresponding to modal IP address

geoip.name: un_developing_nation
geoip.description: UN defined developing nation groups files corresponding to modal IP address

geoip.name: un_special_region
geoip.description: Special Regions Set 1 files: Latin America and the Caribbean.csv,Sub-Saharan-Africa.csv corresponding to modal IP address

description: Dimensional table that tracks the IP addresses used by learners from the edX platform. The IPs themselves are extracted from the tracking log files, and the geolocation details are extracted from the MaxMind IP database using the simeon-geoip script from the simeon CLI tool. Take a look at the documentation for simeon-geoip if you would like to generate and update this table.
